enum  Type {
  eSPRING = 1<<0,
  eACCELERATION_SPRING = 1<<1,
  eRESTITUTION = 1<<2,
  eKEEPBIAS = 1<<3,
  eOUTPUT_FORCE = 1<<4

Detailed Description

constraint row flags

These flags configure the post-processing of constraint rows and the behavior of the solver while solving constraints
